language_changed: The language was changed to 🇺🇸 English!
unexpected_error: Excuse me! Something went wrong. Please try again later.
welcome_message: Welcome to the Dive Logger! I will be your buddy on 🏝 shore! I'm here to assist you with all things scuba diving, freediving, and equipment management. Whether you're a diving enthusiast, a beginner, or just curious, I've got you covered. Here are some things you can do with me: 🌊 Log your dive experiences and keep track of your underwater adventures. 📷 Share dive photos and memories with the community. 🤖 Get equipment recommendations and maintenance tips. 🗺️ Find exciting dive sites and plan your next underwater journey.
language_already_chosen: The language was already set to 🇺🇸 English!
fill_profile_message: 💫 Great choice! Let's fill your profile first. This will allow you to log your dives and get a chance to engage with other divers in the community. How do you want other divers to call you?
skip_filling_profile_message: 😔 You have not filled profile, so I can't log your dives. You can fill it later in the Profile section.
amount_of_dives: 🤿📉 How many dives have you done (enter number)?
profile_photo:
📷 If you want, upload your profile photo.
Other divers would be able to 👀 see it.
not_photo: 🙅‍♂️ This is not a photo! Please, send me a photo.
photo_only_one: 🙅‍♂️ You can send only one photo! Please, send me one photo.
photo_too_big: 🙅‍♂️ This photo is too big! Please, send me a photo with size less than 4 MB.
not_digit: 🙅‍♂️ This is not a number! Please, send me a number.
country: 🌍 What country are you from? On a basis of a country, where you live I can send you recommended dive sites.
not_country: 🙅‍♂️ This is not a country! Please, send me a country. You can also send me your 📍 coordinates, so as I could determine your country automatically.
your_country: 🌍 Your country choice was successfully saved!
invalid_name_length: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid name length! Please, send me a name with length between 3 and 100 characters.
invalid_amount_of_dives: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid amount of dives! Please, send me a number between 0 and 20000.
main_menu: 🏠 Welcome to my Main Menu! I strongly encourage you to 💡 discover my functionalities and make your diving experience better and safer.
invalid_name: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid name! Please, send me a name with letters, spaces, or hyphens.
profile_not_found: 🙅‍♂️ You haven't filled your profile yet! You can do it using one of the buttons below.
settings: ⚙️ Settings Here you can change your language and adjust some other things.
edit_profile_message: ✏️ Edit profile Here you can change your profile information. Use buttons below for this.
edit_name: ✏️ Edit name Please, send me a new name or use the button below to go back to the Edit profile menu.
edit_is_diver: ✏️ Edit diver status Please, choose your diver status or use the button below to go back to the Edit profile menu.
edit_amount_of_dives: ✏️ Edit amount of dives Please, send me a new amount of dives or use the button below to go back to the Edit profile menu.
edit_country: ✏️ Edit country Please, send me a new country(type it or send by button) or use the button below to go back to the Edit profile menu.
edit_profile_photo: ✏️ Edit profile photo Please, send me a new profile photo or use the button below to go back to the Edit profile menu.
support: 📞 Support Here you can contact administrator and ask any questions using button below.
support_message: 📞 Support Please, send me your question or use the button below to go back to the Main menu.
support_message_sent: 🚢 Your message was successfully sent to the administrator! You will get an answer soon...
dives: 🐠 Dives Here you can log your dives and browse your electronic logbook.
add_dive_message: ➕ Add dive 🔢 Please, send me the sequence number of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_max_depth: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid maximal depth! Please, send me a number between 0 and 350.
duration: ⏱️ Duration Please, send me the duration of dive(in minutes, 1 hour 7 minutes = 67) you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
water_temperature: 🌡️ Water temperature Please, send me the water temperature(in Celsius) of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_duration: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid duration! Please, send me a number between 0 and 6000.
date: 📅 Date Please, send me the date of dive you want(as 20.12.2023) to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_water_temperature: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid water temperature! Please, send me a number between -40 and 40.
invalid_date: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid date! Please, send me a date in format 20.12.2023
location: 📍 Location Please, send me the name of dive-spot you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_location: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid location! Please, send me a location with length lower than 150 characters.
visibility: 👀 Visibility Please, send me the visibility(in meters or just description) of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_visibility: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid visibility! Please, send me a visibility with length lower than 50 characters.
dive_type: 🤿 Dive type Please, send me the type of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_dive_type: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid dive type! Please, send me a dive type with length lower than 50 characters.
dive_center: 🏢 Dive center Please, send me the name of dive center you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_dive_center: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid dive center! Please, send me a dive center with length lower than 150 characters.
dive_buddy: 👥 Dive buddy Please, send me the name of dive buddy you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_dive_buddy: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid dive buddy! Please, send me a dive buddy with length lower than 150 characters.
description: 📝 Description Please, send me the description of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_description: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid description! Please, send me a description with length lower than 800 characters.
wetsuit_type: 👕 Wetsuit type Please, send me the type of wetsuit you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_wetsuit_type: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid wetsuit type! Please, send me a wetsuit type with length lower than 70 characters.
wetsuit_thickness: 👕 Wetsuit thickness Please, send me the thickness of wetsuit you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_wetsuit_thickness: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid wetsuit thickness! Please, send me a wetsuit thickness with length lower than 50 characters.
weight: ⚖️ Weight Please, send me the weight(in kilograms) of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_weight: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid weight! Please, send me a weight value between 0 and 50
air_temperature: 🌡️ Air temperature Please, send me the air temperature(in Celsius) of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_air_temperature: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid air temperature! Please, send me a number between -50 and 50.
air_pressure: 🧭 Air pressure Please, send me the air pressure(in hPa) of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_air_pressure: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid air pressure! Please, send me a number between 0 and 2000.
current: 🌊 Current Please, send me the current(in knots or just description) of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_current: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid current! Please, send me a current with length lower than 50 characters.
max_depth: 📉 Maximal Depth Please, send me the maximal depth of dive you want to log or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_dive_number: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid dive number! Please, send me a number between 1 and 20000.
no_dives: 🙅‍♂️ You haven't logged any dives yet! You can do it using one of the buttons below.
gas: 🔋 Gas Please, send me the gas mix you used in this dive or use the button below to go back to the Dives menu.
invalid_gas: 🙅‍♂️ Invalid value of gas! Please, send me a gas description with length lower than 150 characters.
